review: I had been considering a Roku or Apple TV for some time, but had heard the Amazon FireTV was coming out and decided to wait. I ordered it the second day after launch and received it the next day (without paying for 1-day shipping I might add!). I had it setup and ready to go within 5 minutes. It was super easy to hook up to my TV, the voice activated remote works awesome, and I've been watching it every night since. I highly recommend!
author: Wendy H

review: Installed this yesterday. Installation went like a breeze save for a brief glitch with updating. The main thing I notice is that the resolution on this appears to better than Apple TV and is definitely better than Roku. It's a nice addition to the smart-box lineup.
author: LGL

review: This is the future Amazon Fire TV I'll am now learding about this system soul is very good for everyone to have this next step into the future.
author: Eddieharper

review: I've had the Fire TV for close to a week and my husband loves it already. I've found quite a few things on Prime video that I wanted to watch in the past but didn't have time or didn't want to start in the middle of a series. Now I can start with Season One, Episode One of most of them.My husband is not much of a techie but it's simple enough even for him to maneuver. We've discovered ourselves nearly fighting over it a couple of times. I happen to think it's a very simple little device, and I am also impressed with the ability to do Netflix or HuluPlus on it as well. I have it positioned about 5 feet from my WiFi router and have not had any lag or skips so far. I have not yet tried it in another room. It's fast, easy, and even the non-techie in our family can use it, so I'm happy with my purchase.
author: Amazon Customer

review: My son gave this to me for my birthday. It is so easy to use. The how to use tour is excellent. The picture quality is fantastic. Best birthday gift ever!
author: Amazon Customer

review: Amazon Fire TV appears to be a superior set top box. However, Amazon instant video as advertised is somewhat a misleading representation of free instant watch video---much of which is actually pay per view.
author: Thomas G Parker

review: And as more apps become available for it I'm sure I'll use it more. We already have one smart Tv and as it goes I can see us loosing this one also to the kids with the games they can play and the library of available apps
author: Amazon Customer

review: Not as good as the Ruko 3, nothing but a money pit and a cash cow for amazon, slower than Ruko 3 I had, not as many apps, it would be nice if there was a free movie app. you have to go thru many selections to find free movies and then selections are rather limited. also no internet browser. At least the Google Chromcast could stream my laptop to TV which made it easy to watch my home movies. All-in-all the amazon Fire TV is not as good as the Ruko 3, the Microphone function worked great, But I don't use it that much, easier to scroll thru the apps with the remote
